body_html:
@mxbi this issue occurs when i tried to build v0.9.0. Ubuntu16.04, GTX 960, python2, Cuda 8.0, cudnn 4. gcc-4.9 g++-4.9
C++ compilation of rule '//tensorflow/stream_executor:stream_executor' failed: crosstool_wrapper_driver_is_not_gcc failed: error executing command third_party/gpus/crosstool/clang/bin/crosstool_wrapper_driver_is_not_gcc -U_FORTIFY_SOURCE '-D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=1' -fstack-protector -fPIE -Wall -Wunused-but-set-parameter -Wno-free-nonheap-object ... (remaining 100 argument(s) skipped): com.google.devtools.build.lib.shell.BadExitStatusException: Process exited with status 1.

body:
@mxbi this issue occurs when i tried to build v0.9.0. Ubuntu16.04, GTX 960, python2, Cuda 8.0, cudnn 4. gcc-4.9 g++-4.9
C++ compilation of rule '//tensorflow/stream_executor:stream_executor' failed: crosstool_wrapper_driver_is_not_gcc failed: error executing command third_party/gpus/crosstool/clang/bin/crosstool_wrapper_driver_is_not_gcc -U_FORTIFY_SOURCE '-D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=1' -fstack-protector -fPIE -Wall -Wunused-but-set-parameter -Wno-free-nonheap-object ... (remaining 100 argument(s) skipped): com.google.devtools.build.lib.shell.BadExitStatusException: Process exited with status 1.
